GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>If you're curious about <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>,
you should ask those treasure-hunting
brothers about it!<sp:0:4:0>They're near <clr:0000>Foothill Stable<clr:ffff> to the<clr:0000> north<clr:ffff>.
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>If you're curious about <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>,
you should ask those brothers about it!<sp:0:4:0>They're <clr:0000>in front of a cave north of here<clr:ffff>.
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I heard the story from a <clr:0000>pair of treasure-
hunting brothers<clr:ffff> I met.

<sp:3:0:2:0000>If you want to know more, why not talk to
them yourself? They were <clr:0000>in front of a
cave just up north<clr:ffff>.
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Unfortunately, I can't find a cave to
shelter in... What I wouldn't give to be
out of this rain.
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Ease>My precious clothes are still immaculate,
thank heavens!
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>They say the caves of Eldin are practically
bursting with treasure.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Which would be very exciting if they
weren't also <clr:0000>bursting with lava<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>If I walked into one dressed like this,
my clothes would be burned to a crisp.
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I heard the story from a <clr:0000>pair of
treasure-hunting brothers<clr:ffff> I met
near Foothill Stable.
<sp:3:0:2:0000>If you want to know more, why not go
talk to them? Foothill Stable is <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>
of here.
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That was scary!<sp:5:0:0> But I'm OK, and that's
what matters!
talk00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Heh heh...<sp:5:1:0> I overheard some great info
on <clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff>.
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>They say that several of <clr:0000>Misko's treasures<clr:ffff>
are hidden in the many caves of Lanayru!<sp:0:4:0>So it's a shame that the walls of those
caves are <clr:0000>wet and slippery<clr:ffff> and slimy and
BLECH because of all the water in there.
If you think I'm bringing any part of my
wardrobe into that muck, think again!<sp:0:4:0>If only there were some chic outfit that
let me climb walls without slipping...
talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Aaand it looks like you overheard me.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Perfect! This is so juicy, I've gotta share!
You've heard of Misko's treasure? The
famous bandit's huge <clr:0000>clothing collection<clr:ffff>?
<sp:3:0:2:0000>The story goes that Misko <clr:0000>hid it in caves
all throughout the land<clr:ffff>. Just the thought
gets my fashion-loving heart pounding!
talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Oh, hey! We meet again.


The story goes that Misko's legendary
clothing collection is <clr:0000>hidden in caves
throughout the land<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>As a devotee of fashion, I intend to find
every last piece!
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Many of <clr:0000>Misko's treasures <clr:ffff>are hidden
in caves across Eldin...but those caves
are <clr:0000>white hot with bubbling lava<clr:ffff>.
Unfortunately for me, I'm not dressed for
cave-diving. I'd hate for my outfit to catch
on fire.<sp:5:1:0> Again.
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Rainy days are the worst. I start the day
as an elegant fashionista and end it as a
sad, soggy mop.
Now I understand why Misko hid their
collection in caves.<sp:5:0:0> You have to keep
your clothes dry somehow.
GoalPoint_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think_01>I was hoping a nice concert might help
perk me up.

But the band seems busy right now.<sp:5:1:0> I'll
try waiting a bit. If they don't get things
sorted out, I can come back later.
Failed00: <sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>Oh, darn it!<sp:5:0:0> Why'd this happen to me?
ComNakedCheck_W_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Excuse me!<sp:0:4:0>Don't you think it's a little rude to talk to
a stylish lady like myself in such distinctly
UN-stylish dress?<sp:0:4:0>Sorry, I have no interest in chatting with
someone who thinks that underpants are
a worthy fashion statement.
GoalPoint_01_4:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think_01>I was hoping a nice concert might help
brighten my day.<sp:0:4:0>But it looks like the band isn't even here.
Just my luck.<sp:5:1:0>
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Owww...<sp:5:1:0> Ugh, and now my clothes are
all dirty too.
GoalPoint_01_5:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>Well, since I'm here, I can do my thinking
after I watch the band perform.
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're the only reason I'm still here.<sp:5:0:0>
Please take this little thank-you!
